name: Emnon Localized Link Creator
author: emnon,barihossain,sajjadul

sections.description:
Website: http://emnon.com
Plugin URL: [Emnon Localized Link Creator] (http://blog.emnon.com/2016/10/27/emnon-localized-link-creator/)

Emnon localized link creator provides option for website owner to create location based links and/or affiliate links. Geo targeted product link will help website visitors to choose the right resource.

Emnon localized link provides :
* Create country based link based on term (words, sentence)
* Easily edit or delete created link
* Search previously created links very easily
* Use short code to wrap any product. Check screenshots or video instruction

Visitor location detection policy
Site visitor’s location information is retrieved based on IP address using freegeoip.net . freegeoip.net provides a public HTTP API for software developers to search the geolocation of IP addresses. It uses a database of IP addresses that are associated to cities along with other relevant information like time zone, latitude and longitude.

You’re allowed up to 10,000 queries per hour by default. Once this limit is reached, all of your requests will result in HTTP 403, forbidden, until your quota is cleared.

The freegeoip web server is free and open source so if the public service limit is a problem for you, download it and run your own instance.

Short code example
[emaflink term=”emnon”]Emnon content here[/emaflink]
sections.installation:
1. Upload the emnonlocalizedlinkcreator/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the new ‘Emnon affiliate’ menu under settings.
  4. See a list of already created terms.
  5. Add, edit or delete terms.
  6. Search any term.
sections.faq:
How to use short code in post or page?

Use [emaflink term=”term”]term content[/emaflink]. Term inside short code can be a single word or multiple words. Term content is usual description.
